title: Gum Luck
description: Gabby Gomez's love of bubble gum has resulted in her becoming Gum Girl! With her new powers Gabby can save the day, but keeping her gummy alter-ego a secret is another matter altogether. Will she tell her parents who she is at the expense of admitting she disobeyed her mother's strict orders? Or will a new adversary make coming clean impossible? Stay tuned!
author: Rhode Montijo
